properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.enabled
properties.description: Enable/Disable configuration of config server on startup.

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.git.branch
properties.description: Branch of the repository to use.

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.git.timeout
properties.description: Timeout (in seconds) for obtaining HTTP or SSH connection (if applicable), defaults to 5 seconds.

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.git.refresh-rate
properties.description: Time (in seconds) between refresh of the git repository, defaults to 30 seconds.

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.git.clone-on-start
properties.description: Flag to indicate that the repository should be cloned on startup (not on demand). Generally leads to slower startup but faster first query.

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.server.health-path
properties.description: Path to the actuator health's endpoint, default to "/actuator/health".

properties.name: testcontainer.config-server.server.wait-timeout
properties.description: Duration (in seconds) of waiting time until container treated as started, defaults to 60 seconds.

values.description: Enable configuration of config server on startup.
Disable configuration of config server on startup.
